thread.title: Mom's 60th Birthday Trip
thread.title_full: Mom's 60th Birthday Trip - Review of The Westin New York at Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: jennyrC4627KZ
title: Mom's 60th Birthday Trip
text: We had an amazing time in NYC and the Westin was in the perfect location for the play and activities we had planned. We arrived early but the room was already available for us to check-in. The staff was very helpful and courteous. I will definitely stay there again!
